quote: Au milieu de l'hiver, j'ai découvert en moi un invincible été
author: Albert Camus

quote: On ne voit bien qu'avec le cœur. L'essentiel est invisible pour les yeux.", Antoine de Saint-Exupéry, 1943, Le Petit Prince"
I am a man. Nothing human is alien to me
author: Terence

quote: No man ever steps in the same river twice, for it is not the same river and he is not the same man.
author: Heraclitus

quote: Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards.
author: Søren Kierkegaard

quote: “Think lightly of yourself and deeply of the world.”
author: Miyamoto Musashi

quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: You have to be a warrior to be a poet.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: You have to odd to be number one.
author: Dr Seuss
source: "One Fish Two Fish Red Fish Blue Fish"
